title: Artificial Intelligence
description: An overview of artificial intelligence, its history, applications, and future prospects
author: Tech Writer
contentPreview:
# Artificial Intelligence

Artificial Intelligence (AI) is one of the most transformative technologies of our time, revolutionizing industries and changing how we interact with machines.

## What is Artificial Intelligence?

Artificial Intelligence refers to the simulation of human intelligence in machines that are programmed to think and learn like humans. The term may also be applied to any machine that exhibits traits associated with a human mind such as learning and problem-solving.

title: Quantum Computing
description: Understanding quantum computing, its principles, and potential applications
author: Science Writer
contentPreview:
# Quantum Computing

Quantum computing represents a paradigm shift in computation, leveraging the principles of quantum mechanics to process information in fundamentally new ways.

## What is Quantum Computing?

Quantum computing uses quantum mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computations. Unlike classical computers that use bits (0 or 1), quantum computers use quantum bits or "qubits" that can exist in multiple states simultaneously.
